# Biography of Sylvia Hu

Hi there! My name is Sylvia Hu. I was born in [Chongqing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chongqing), a city located in the southwest of China, in 1998. I am now currently pursuing *Masters in Financial Analysis* degree at **London Business School**.

Here are a few things to help you know more about me :)

1. Academics
    * I graduated from [Fudan University](https://www.fudan.edu.cn/en/) with my BBA in Financial Management in Jun.2021.
    * Before studying business, I studied Chemistry for 2 years during undergraduate study.
    * I went to [University of San Diego](https://www.sandiego.edu/) for exchange in Fall 2019.

2. Career
    * During my undergraduate study, I interned in many sectors of Financial Industry:

        - [China International Capital Corporation](https://en.cicc.com/): Investment Banking Intern
        - [China Securities](https://www.csc108.com/newsiteindex/index.jspx): Bond Underwriting Intern
